name: USG Reference Registry
description: Illustrative reference registry for the Universal Sports Graph (USG), providing canonical JSON records for events, leagues, teams, venues, broadcasters, and rights bundles.
notes: This registry is illustrative but normative in structure for USG-compliant deployments.
Records in this snapshot are aligned with RFC 0001 (The Universal Sports Graph) and RFC 0002 (USG Entitlement Token Profile).
Indexes under registry/_index are generated from the JSON records and may be regenerated by local tools.
